content.description: Researchers asked subjects to complete various activities and documented the lobe of the cerebral cortex activated for each one. The results are stated in the table.
content.question: Lobes of the Brain Lobe A responsibilities Lobe B responsibilities Lobe C responsibilities Lobe D responsibilities Reading a sentence aloud Retrieving a long-term memory Understanding words spoken into an earpiece Identifying shapes from a series of photos flashed in the visual field Solving a math problem Determining whether water was warm or cold Recognizing a face in a photograph Moving arms Which of the following is the lobe most likely represented by the activity in “Lobe C”?

skill.text: 3.A: Identify psychology-related concepts in descriptions or representations of data.
